name: Date Över
description:
In this fast passed quick time action game you play as a angsty shy shark. Try to find your perfect date, but be aware if you anxiety gets too high your natural instincts may take over.

Best when played with xbox controller. 

Game was made in ~12 hours, so it doesn't have any bugs, only great amount of surprise features

Credits:

Sapazu: Code, Game design 

Nicole: Key art, UI art, Game design

Ale: Animation, Game design 

Joni: Narrative design, Game design, Technical artist 

Jarno: Level art, Character animation, Narrative design 

Sara: Character art & design, Narrative design 

Eeli: Character art & design, Narrative design
